alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:59AM CDT until June 01 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CARSON...SOUTHEASTERN HUTCHINSON...GRAY AND SOUTHERN ROBERTS COUNTIES... At 659 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Pampa to near Kingsmill to 6 miles southeast of White Deer, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Pampa, White Deer, Mclean, Lefors, Lake Mcclellan, Kingsmill, Alanreed and Codman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
